review: The experience was good, it was diagnosed at Surya but after one week the fever relapsed. My son was admitted for one weak and he was diagnosed for viral fever after one weak it got relapse, so I didn't go to Surya again, my family doctor told me after he injected antibiotics and all during admission period but after discharged they could have been continued with oral antibiotics but they didn't have prescribed to the patient so that's why the bacteria may not have completely wiped out but it relapsed for some reason. I know Surya hospital is well known so visited I would like to recommend the doctor, I am happy with the explanation of health issue only thing is they could have suggested oral antibiotic after being discharged there was only one syrup was given I think they left some testing part and all, my son both hands were paining, so I didn't went to the hospital, I know Surya hospital is well known for paediatric I think they have to come a little bit higher level side to diagnosed properly and systematically.

I visited for paediatric reason, he is the fine doctor I like him it was not my first visit 4 times such, I would definitely recommend the doctor to my family or friends, the overall experience was good, I like the hospital and Dr. Bhupendra is also very nice he does listen to our queries and answer it, I am satisfied with his treatment.

Consultation experience was good, visited for my child. The doctor was listening to my problems, he is very good at behaviour, my pediatrician doctor suggested to me about the doctor after that we are visiting him regularly. Hospital facilities are good waiting time is not a big deal. Staff and nursing absolutely fine, I am happy with the overall experience* ********** * ***** *******

my seven year old child was crying endlessly due to gas in tummy ,I was alone with no other family member , they got his sonography done , it was clear , so they said that the sonographist is not experienced , we need to get another done , **** * ****** ***** **** was escalated to an appendix problem .*** *** * ***** *** ***** ********** ** ***** **** ********** ******** ******* ******** **** ******* **** **** ** **** ***** *** ** ******* *even their swipe machines were not working and were demanding for cash saying out bank account has been closed ..it was a bad bad disheartening experience ** **** ********* ** ** ***** *** *** *** *****

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: History of patient was taken my one doctor then passed on to senior doctor who just asks to go for urine test and wait for report. Once the report comes the senior doctor does not even look the patient and some different  ****** doctor prescribes the medicine *** **** *** **** **** *** ********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I have visited him before for my niece n nephew. This time it was for my daughter. First of all he always calm down your tension n his tone of saying that all will be fine n there is nothing to worry means a world to a parent.

And he is was very friendly with my 2 year old
*** ******* ** **** **** ************ *** he is busy with so many patient due to which he could not able to give much time to us.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Avasthi is a senior doctor and very pleasant. He is a thorough professional and extremely approachable.I am glad we met him .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Doctor is experienced. He patiently heard all the issues and gave us the plan accordingly. satisfied

\"The experience was good, visited for my fever, the doctor was listening to my problems his behaviour is very good he was calm and cool. I am happy with his explanation. Hospital facility was good I don't have any problem with waiting time was not much staff and nursing were good. I will recommend the doctor to my friends and family.\r\n\
